Buron Sejak 2012, PNS Terpidana Korupsi Visa Ditangkap di Bandara Bali
05 Nov 2019, 09:52 by Aditya Mardiastuti
Jakarta - Kejaksaan menangkap Raden M Soleh, terpidana kasus korupsi visa on arrival (VOA) di Bandara I Gusti Ngurah Rai, Bali. Soleh merupakan petugas Imigrasi yang saat itu bekerja di bandara I Gusti Ngurah Rai.
Soleh sempat diburu jaksa dari Kejaksaan Negeri Denpasar hingga ke Palembang. Namun, setibanya di Palembang Soleh tidak hadir tanpa keterangan.
"Yang bersangkutan pegawai Imigrasi masih aktif, selanjutnya saya dan Kasi Pidsus ke Palembang karena data yang kita dapatkan di Imigrasi Palembang. Kemarin Senin (5/11) pagi kita koordinasi ke Kakanwilnya, yang bersangkutan tidak ada di kantor tanpa keterangan, katanya alasan keluarga di Jakarta," kata Kasi Intel Kejari Denpasar Gusti Ngurah Agung Ary Kusuma, Selasa (5/11/2019).
Dari situ Ary dan Kasi Pidsus Nengah Astawa melacak nomor telepon Soleh. Rupanya, Soleh diketahui sedang berada di Bali.
"Saat dilacak posisi sinyal di Kutuh, Pandawa. Kita koordinasi dengan tim di Denpasar dengan Kasi Pidum dengan KP3 Bandara dan Angkasa Pura. Akhirnya satgas yang mau berangkat tujuan Jakarta mencari," jelasnya.


Foto: Penangkapan PNS terpidana korupsi di Bali (dok. Kejari Denpasar)

Soleh diketahui sudah berada di dalam pesawat tujuan Jakarta. Dia bersama istrinya lalu diminta turun dari pesawat.
"Akhirnya kita tangkap dalam pesawat kita panggil lagi kita ajak turun, kita tangkap. Dia sama istrinya naik JT 015 Lion penerbangan ke Jakarta," terang Ary.

It is wanted since 2012, civil servants convicted of Corruption Visa Arrested at Bali Airport
05 Nov 2019, 09:52 by Aditya Mardiastuti
Jakarta - The Attorney General's Office arrested Raden M Soleh, a convicted of a visa on arrival (VOA) corruption case at I Gusti Ngurah Rai Airport, Bali. Soleh is an immigration officer who was working at I Gusti Ngurah Rai airport.
Soleh was hunted by prosecutors from the Denpasar District Attorney to Palembang. However, on arrival in Palembang Soleh was not present without explanation.
"The relevant Immigration employee is still active, then I and the Head of Pidsus went to Palembang because of the data we got at Palembang Immigration. Yesterday Monday (11/5) morning we coordinated with the Regional Office, the relevant person was not in the office without information," he said. Jakarta, "said the Head of the Denpasar Kejari Denpasar Gusti Ngurah Agung Ary Kusuma, Tuesday (11/05/2019).
From there Ary and Kids Pidsus Nengah Astawa tracked down Soleh's telephone number. Apparently, Soleh is known to be in Bali.
"When the signal position was tracked in Kutuh, Pandawa. We coordinated with the team in Denpasar with Kasi Pidum with KP3 Airport and Angkasa Pura. Finally, the task force that wanted to leave for Jakarta was looking for it," he explained.


Photo: Arrest of a civil servant convicted of corruption in Bali (doc. Kejari Denpasar)

Soleh is known to have been on a plane bound for Jakarta. He and his wife were then asked to get off the plane.
"Finally we catch on the plane we call again we take down, we catch. He and his wife boarded the JT 015 Lion flight to Jakarta," explained Ary.
